item.title: Loose wire on ship may have led to Baltimore bridge collapse, report says
item.description: The cargo ship lost power before crashing into the Francis Scott Key Bridge, leaving six workers dead.

item.title: Judge rules Meta doesn't have monopoly after Instagram, WhatsApp acquisitions
item.description: The decision allows Instagram's parent company to avoid the prospect of the company breaking up

item.title: Cristiano Ronaldo to visit White House on same day as Saudi crown prince
item.description: The Portuguese player is being paid handsomely to be part of the gulf state's modernisation plan.

item.title: Diddy denies sexual battery allegation after Los Angeles authorities open probe
item.description: The new criminal investigation comes as the music mogul is serving a 4-year prison term.

item.title: Stunning McTominay overhead kick gives Scotland lead over Denmark
item.description: Watch Scott McTominay's stunning overhead kick give Scotland an early lead in their decisive World Cup qualifier with Denmark.
